mapper.insert: insert into enterprise (id, role, enterprise_number, password, enterprise_name, leader, phone, email, add_time, enterprise_introduction) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterpriseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enterpriseIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update enterprise set role = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enterprise_number = #{enterpriseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, leader = #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enterprise_introduction = #{enterpriseIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, role, enterprise_number, password, enterprise_name, leader, phone, email, add_time, enterprise_introduction from enterprise where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, role, enterprise_number, password, enterprise_name, leader, phone, email, add_time, enterprise_introduction from enterprise
